reviewText: This a good movie and worth watching over & over! Plus this movie will be on 9/16 at 11:00am on the Hallmark channel! I will be watching this Mon. 9/16..That's The Hallmark Movie Channel! Like Edward Asner!
This is a WONDERFUL movie. I know a lot of folks who would buy the dvd. When can we expect it?
I love this movie and would love to have a copy of it. I don't understand why this movie has not been released for purchase.
i saw this on the hallmark channel its a really good movie it was great that his grandson got to have that time with his grandfather also saw on pixl channel  i recently got this on ioffer
This one of the best movies Ed Asner starred in.  It is one I want to share with my children and grandchildren.  There must be a reason Hallmark hasn't released it.
I saw this movie several years ago and taped it on a VHS.  I sincerely hope that someday this will be re-released so that I can add it to my movie library.
This is a great movie and I can't wait till Amazon gets it so I can order my copy.
